query: exercise tolerance functional capacity amiodarone beta-blockers atrial fibrillation physical activity six minute walk
title: The Complex but Fascinating Relationship between Sport and Atrial Fibrillation: From Pathophysiology to the Clinical Scenario
authors: Tatangelo, M., Rebecchi, M., Sgueglia, M., Colella, A., Crescenzi, C., Panattoni, G., Ciampi, P., Lanza, O., Canali, E., & Calò, L.
journal: Journal of Cardiovascular Development and Disease
reference: Tatangelo, M., Rebecchi, M., Sgueglia, M., Colella, A., Crescenzi, C., Panattoni, G., Ciampi, P., Lanza, O., Canali, E., & Calò, L. (2023).
